long_description: The RFID Aluminum Wallet from REI deters theft of your funds and your identification by blocking access to financial and personal data stored inside bank cards that have RFID chips. Special barrier in the wallet blocks unauthorized scanning of RFID (radio frequency identification) chips inside credit and debit cards. The REI RFID Aluminum Wallet holds up to 10 cards; easily operated clasp presses open and snaps shut; accordion-style slots make cards simple to find. Light yet sturdy aluminum stands up to wear and tear.
short_description: The RFID Aluminum Wallet from REI deters theft of your funds and your identification by blocking access to financial and personal data stored inside bank cards that have RFID chips.
